metadata.name: valentina, baby
metadata.description:
Introducing "With Love," a captivating NFT collection that captures my transformative journey into the unknown as a full-time artist after a decade-long hiatus. This exquisite series consists of seven meticulously hand-painted pieces, each representing a profound lesson I've learned along the way.

Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of "With Love," where vulnerability and self-love intertwine with fearless creativity. Through this collection, I've discovered the power of embracing my true artistic expression, free from the constraints of societal judgment and online criticism. These captivating artworks serve as a testament to my personal growth, inspiring others to embark on their own creative odyssey.

Experience the transformative power of "With Love," a collection that celebrates authenticity, courage, and the boundless possibilities that await when we dare to embrace our true passions.
